schemaPath.description: A .graphql file that describes the schema using GraphQL SDL, e.g. "./schema.graphql", or a JSON file containing the result of a GraphQL Introspection query

includes.description: A glob pattern matching included files

excludes.description: A glob pattern matching excluded files

projects.description: One or more projects as an object keyed by project name. Values are objects with fields describing schema structure, endpoints etc.

.*.description: A named project with fields for describing schema structure, endpoints etc.

name.description: The name of this project. If absent, the key of this project config object will be used as the project name.

schemaPath.description: A .graphql file that describes the schema for this project using GraphQL SDL, e.g. "./project-one-schema.graphql"

includes.description: A glob pattern matching included files

excludes.description: A glob pattern matching excluded files

extensions.description: Extensions to add additional configuration such as locations of GraphQL endpoint and framework-specific configuration.

endpoints.description: GraphQL endpoints used for introspection and queries etc.

.*.description: A string containing the URL of the endpoint, or an object with the URL and headers

headers.description: HTTP headers to send with requests

introspect.description: Boolean indicating whether this endpoint should be introspected automatically by the tool that loads the configuration, e.g. an IDE
